verses.roman:
evaṁ yogānubhāvena
dam-patyo ramamāṇayoḥ
śataṁ vyatīyuḥ śaradaḥ
kāma-lālasayor manāk

synonyms: evam—thus; yoga-anubhāvena—by yogic powers; dam-patyoḥ—the couple; ramamāṇayoḥ—while enjoying themselves; śatam—a hundred; vyatīyuḥ—passed; śaradaḥ—autumns; kāma—sexual pleasure; lālasayoḥ—who were eagerly longing for; manāk—like a short time.
translation: While the couple, who eagerly longed for sexual pleasure, were thus enjoying themselves by virtue of mystic powers, a hundred autumns passed like a brief span of time.
